design_philosophy.core_concept: Professional Team Chat meets WhatsApp Polish
design_philosophy.visual_style: Glassmorphism + Deep Matte Backgrounds + Neon Accents for AI

Sidebar.description: Professional team sidebar with glass header and active states.

styles.container: w-[30%] min-w-[320px] bg-[#111b21] border-r border-[#2a3942] flex flex-col
styles.header: h-16 px-4 bg-[#202c33] flex items-center justify-between shadow-sm
styles.item: flex items-center gap-3 px-4 py-3 cursor-pointer hover:bg-[#202c33] transition-colors border-b border-[#2a3942]/50
styles.avatar: w-12 h-12 rounded-full bg-[#6a7175] flex items-center justify-center text-xl text-white font-bold

ChatWindow.description: Immersive chat area with subtle background pattern.

styles.header: h-16 bg-[#202c33] px-4 flex items-center gap-4 shadow-md z-10

MessageBubble.description: Distinct styles for User, Agent, and Consensus.

User.container: bg-[#005c4b] text-[#e9edef] rounded-lg rounded-tr-none shadow-sm max-w-[65%]

Agent.container: bg-[#202c33] text-[#e9edef] rounded-lg rounded-tl-none border border-[#2a3942] shadow-sm max-w-[65%]

Consensus.container: bg-[#1f2c34] border border-[#FFD700]/30 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,215,0,0.1)] rounded-xl w-[80%] mx-auto my-4
Consensus.header: flex items-center gap-2 px-4 py-2 border-b border-[#FFD700]/20 bg-[#FFD700]/5 text-[#FFD700] font-bold text-xs uppercase tracking-wider
Consensus.dropdown_trigger: w-full py-2 text-xs text-[#8696a0] hover:text-[#e9edef] flex items-center justify-center gap-2 cursor-pointer transition-colors bg-[#111b21]/50 rounded-b-xl

styles.container: px-4 py-3 bg-[#202c33] flex items-center gap-2
styles.input: flex-1 bg-[#2a3942] text-[#e9edef] rounded-lg px-4 py-3 focus:outline-none focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#00a884] placeholder-[#8696a0]
styles.button: p-3 bg-[#00a884] hover:bg-[#008f6f] text-white rounded-lg transition-transform active:scale-95 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed

TypingIndicator.description: Smooth 3-dot animation in a glass bubble.

styles.container: bg-[#202c33] px-4 py-3 rounded-xl rounded-tl-none w-fit flex gap-1 items-center shadow-sm border border-[#2a3942]

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement 'ConsensusMessage' using a Collapsible pattern (state: isOpen) to show/hide detailed agent thoughts if available.

Update 'ChatWindow.jsx' to group consecutive 'agent' messages under a 'Consensus' block if logical, OR simply make the Consensus message a standalone summary with an expandable 'Show Reasoning' section.
Replace all hardcoded colors with the palette variables defined above (or use Tailwind arbitrary values consistent with the palette).
Add 'framer-motion' layout animations for smooth message insertion.
Ensure the 'Consensus' message stands out visually as the 'Final Decision' (Gold/Amber theme).
